src_original: na sattvāgaṇeyasya,  na sattvāgaṇeyaparivartasya,  na sattvātulyasya,  na sattvātulyaparivartasya,  na sattvācintyasya,  na sattvācintyaparivartasya,  na sattvāparyantasya,  na sattvāparyantaparivartasya,  na sattvāmāpyasya,  na sattvāmāpyaparivartasya,
tgt_original: 非為一國土微塵等眾生故發心，非為二、三至十百千萬億千萬億阿由陀、那由他，乃至不可說不可說國土微塵等眾生故發心；

src_original: na sattvānabhilāpyasya,  na sattvānabhilāpyaparivartasya,  na sattvānabhilāpyānabhilāpyasya arthāya,  na sattvānabhilāpyānabhilāpyaparivartasyārthāya /  naikalokadhātuparyāpannānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya,  na yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyalokadhātuparyāpannānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya,
tgt_original: 非為一閻浮提微塵等眾生故發心，非為拘陀尼、欝怛羅曰、弗婆提微塵等眾生故發心；
非為小千世界、中千世界、大千世界微塵等眾生故發心；

src_original: na yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamalokadhātuparyāpannānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate yaduta paripākavinayāya,  api tu aśeṣaniḥśeṣānavaśeṣasarvalokadhātuparyāpannānāṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate yaduta paripākavinayāya
tgt_original: 非為二、三至十百千萬億阿由他、那由陀，乃至不可說不可說三千大千世界微塵等眾生故發心。

src_original: naikabuddhārāgaṇatāyai  bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate yaduta ārāgaṇābhirādhanapūjopasthānatāyai /  na daśabuddhārāgaṇābhirādhanapūjopasthānatāyai,
tgt_original: 「非為供養供給一佛故發心，乃至非為供養供給不可說不可說諸佛故發心；

src_original: na yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamabuddhārāgaṇābhirādhanapūjopasthānatāyai bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate /  naikalokadhātuparyāpannabuddhavaṃśārāgaṇābhirādhanapūjopasthānatāyai, (Gv 84)  na yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamalokadhātuparyāpannatathāgatavaṃśārāgaṇābhirādhanapūjopasthānatāyai bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate /
tgt_original: 非為供養供給一國土微塵等諸佛故發心，乃至非為供養供給不可說不可說三千大千世界微塵等諸佛故發心。
「非為淨一佛土故發心，乃至非為淨不可說不可說三千大千世界微塵等佛土故發心。

src_original: naikatathāgataśāsanasaṃdhāraṇāya,  na yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥ samatathāgataśāsanasaṃdhāraṇāya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate /  naikabuddhaprasthānapraṇidhānavimātratāvataraṇāya na yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamabuddhaprasthānapraṇidhānavimātrāvaraṇāya  naikatathāgatabuddhakṣetravyūhāvataraṇatāyai,
tgt_original: 「非為受持一佛法故發心，乃至非為受持不可說不可說三千大千世界微塵等佛法故發心。

src_original: na yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamatathāgatabuddhakṣetravyūhāvataraṇāya,  bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate /  naikabuddhaparṣanmaṇḍalavibhaktyavataraṇāya,  na yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamabuddhaparṣanmaṇḍalavibhaktyavataraṇāya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate /
tgt_original: 「非為令一三千大千世界中佛種不斷故發心，乃至非為令不可說不可說三千大千世界微塵等三千大千世界中佛種不斷故發心。

src_original: naikatathāgatadharmacakrasaṃdhāraṇāya,  na yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamatathāgatadharmacakrasaṃdhāraṇāya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate /  naikasattvacittasamudrāvataraṇāya,
tgt_original: 「非為分別知一佛願故發心，乃至非為分別知不可說不可說三千大千世界微塵等佛願故發心。
「非為莊嚴一佛土故發心，乃至非為莊嚴不可說不可說三千大千世界微塵等佛土故發心。

src_original: naikasattvendriyacakraparijñāyai,  na yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamasattvendriyaparijñāyai bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate /  naikasattvendriyasāgarāvataraṇāya,
tgt_original: 「非為分別知一佛會弟子眾故發心，乃至非為分別知不可說不可說三千大千世界微塵等佛會弟子眾故發心。
「非為持一佛法輪故發心，乃至非為持不可說不可說三千大千世界微塵等佛法輪故發心。
